post:
[CosmosTeck](http://www.cosmosteck.com) is an OpenVZ,Xen VPS hosting company. [CosmosTeck](http://www.cosmosteck.com) were founded in November 2011 and provide OpenVZ, Xen VPS servers. 

Our nodes are equipped with: 
a Intel Quad Xeon CPU Or AMD Opteron CPU; 
at least 24GB REG DDR3 RAM; 
multiple Western Digital Hard Drives in Hardware RAID 10 with 3Ware/LSI/Adaptec cards 
and connected to a 1Gbps port.

May be we are not the best, and even though we are younger. But we are trying our best service for you.

Here we bring a coupon code to you :

50% OFF Recurring Code: **LET50OFF**


**Xen 512M** - $4.97/mo with Coupon
4 Cores
512MB RAM
1GB Swap
20GB DiskSpace
Raid10 Array
100Mbps Port
500GB Bandwidth
1 Dedicated IPv4
5 Dedicated IPv6
Unmanaged
Linux
Normally $9.95/mo
Order Link: [http://client.cosmosteck.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=53](http://client.cosmosteck.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=53)


This coupon is also apply to OpenVZ Plans(Except OVZ3 & Special Plans)


**Network Information:**
Servers are located in Los Angeles, California with OC3 Network(QuadraNet).
Test IPv4: 192.161.49.3
Test File: [http://test.lax.cosmosteck.com/100mb.bin](http://test.lax.cosmosteck.com/100mb.bin)


**Pamyment Method accepted:**
1.Paypal
2.Liberty Reserve
3.Alipay


For additional information, or to view our additional products and services, please visit [www.cosmosteck.com](http://www.cosmosteck.com) ; email us anytime at sales(at)cosmosteck.com.
